1.caption_en: A blank "Longtail Discovery v5.0" platform canvas showing Consumer Segments (left), Platform (center), and Producer Segments (right), with a central "Value Propositions" column and longtail/shorttail indicator graphs. It’s a template for mapping key value propositions to stakeholder segments during platform generation.
1.caption_ru: A blank "Longtail Discovery v5.0" platform canvas showing Consumer Segments (left), Platform (center), and Producer Segments (right), with a central "Value Propositions" column and longtail/shorttail indicator graphs. It’s a template for mapping key value propositions to stakeholder segments during platform generation.

2.caption_en:
A blank "Longtail Discovery v5.0" platform canvas for mapping consumer and producer segments (longtail vs shorttail) with a central column for value propositions and a large grid area for stakeholder alignment. The template includes labeled top bands for Consumer Segments, Platform, and Producer Segments, plus footer branding and a title field.

{
  "type": "canvas_template",
  "title": "Longtail Discovery",
  "version": "v5.0",
  "summary": "Blank platform design canvas to map consumer and producer segments and to define value propositions for a platform.",
  "layout": {
    "top_row": [
      {
        "id": "consumer_segments",
        "label": "CONSUMER SEGMENTS",
        "position": "top_left",
        "background_color": "#f6dede",
        "icon": "group",
        "sublabels": [
          "LONGTAIL",
          "SHORTTAIL"
        ],
        "trend_curve": "slightly_rising_right"
      },
      {
        "id": "platform",
        "label": "PLATFORM",
        "position": "top_center",
        "background_color": "#2ea6aa"
      },
      {
        "id": "producer_segments",
        "label": "PRODUCER SEGMENTS",
        "position": "top_right",
        "background_color": "#ecf7d9",
        "icon": "factory",
        "sublabels": [
          "SHORTTAIL",
          "LONGTAIL"
        ],
        "trend_curve": "declining_right"
      }
    ],
    "center_column": {
      "id": "value_propositions",
      "label": "VALUE PROPOSITIONS",
      "position": "center",
      "background_color": "#e6f6f8",
      "instruction_text": "Please define here the key Value Propositions (Solutions) of your Platform and match them to the most relevant stakeholder segments"
    },
    "main_area": {
      "description": "Large blank grid area for mapping details and alignment between consumer and producer segments",
      "grid_lines": true
    },
    "footer": {
      "left": [
        "SOLUTION STACK",
        "PIK logo"
      ],
      "center": "LONGTAIL DISCOVERY v5.0 - Part of the Platform Innovation Kit - the toolset for the platform generation",
      "right": [
        "TITLE input box",
        "fb.one logo",
        "QR code"
      ]
    }
  },
  "detected_text": [
    "LONGTAIL",
    "SOLUTION STACK",
    "CONSUMER SEGMENTS",
    "SHORTTAIL",
    "LONGTAIL DISCOVERY v5.0",
    "PLATFORM",
    "VALUE PROPOSITIONS",
    "Please define here the key Value Propositions (Solutions) of your Platform and match them to the most relevant stakeholder segments",
    "TITLE",
    "PRODUCER SEGMENTS"
  ],
  "visual_notes": {
    "color_palette": "pastel (pink/red for consumers, teal for platform, light green for producers, pale blue for center)",
    "icons_present": [
      "group icon (top-left)",
      "factory icon (top-right)",
      "branding logos in footer",
      "QR code in footer"
    ],
    "orientation": "landscape"
  }
}
